rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {2309, M6010}

unitName: IVF processes: Embryo production and cryopreservation techniques (practical)
description: The theoretical aspects of IVF, embryo production and cryopreservation will be covered in the previous unit reinforced by extensive practical training  The theoretical knowledge gained in slow cooling and vitrification techniques will also enhanced by practical training. Students will freeze, thaw and analyse sperm samples, oocytes and embryos Students will gain a better understanding of media components by making and designing their own media. This unit enables students to develop and enhance their embryo handling skills.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
